msContents.summary: This manuscript contains the 16th-century Laghuṭīkā of Śivāgrayogin. It is a short commentary on the Śivajñānabodha, 12 verses that purport to be part of the Śaivasiddhānta Rauravāgama, although it does not appear in the published edition of the work. Śivāgrayogin's commentary was previously published in The Pandit in 1907, and a more recent critical edition and translation by T. Ganesan was published in 2003. However, this manuscript contains an introductory paragraph at the beginning that does not appear in either printed publication.
